data.name: Troubled World generator
data.description:
{
"team": "Council of Defenders",
"team_lore": "The Council of Defenders, composed of four extraordinary families, led Casca's army against the Empire's overwhelming invasion force. Despite initial expectations of swift defeat, their formidable defense—dubbed The Indebted Defense—successfully repelled the attack using a combination of conventional and magical warfare.",
"sub_teams": [
{
"team": "The Alchamists",
"team_lore": "The Alchamists, a family of magical psychics, use White and Black Jade to protect themselves and Cascan civilians from the Empire. Their notable achievement includes resurrecting the dead to fend off the invasion before finally letting them rest.",
"members": [
{
"name": "Elena Seraphi",
"alias": "Madam Alchemia",
"role": "Wife of Julian, Mother of Iris & Tobias, Mistress of Black Jade",
"personality": "Wise, Enigmatic",
"abilities": ["Necromancy", "Illusions Conjurer", "Energy Manipulation"],
"eye_color": "Grey",
"hair_color": "Silver",
"skin_color": "Pale",
"costume": "Grey Bodysuit, Red Robes, Silver Gauntlets, Grey belt, Red Boots"
},
{
"name": "Julian Seraphi",
"alias": "Mister Alchemia",
"role": "Husband of Elena, Father of Iris & Tobias, Wielder of White Jade",
"personality": "Analytical, Knowledgeable",
"abilities": ["Swordsmanship", "Pre-cognition", "Telekinesis"],
"eye_color": "Green",
"hair_color": "Red",
"skin_color": "Fair",
"costume": "Grey Catsuit, Black Kevlar Vest, Black Utility Belt, Silver Gauntlet, Black Boots"
},
{
"name": "Iris Seraphi",
"alias": "Little Alchemia",
"role": "Daughter of Elena & Julian, Sister of Tobias, Trainee of Black Jade",
"personality": "Enthusiastic, Curious",
"abilities": ["Pre-cognition", "Energy Manipulation"],
"eye_color": "Grey",
"hair_color": "Grey",
"skin_color": "Pale",
"costume": "Grey Catsuit, Red Robes, Silver Gauntlets, Grey belt, Red Boots"
},
{
"name": "Tobias Seraphi",
"alias": "Wild Alchemia",
"role": "Son of Elena & Julian, Brother of Iris",
"personality": "Fierce, unpredictable",
"abilities": ["Energy Manipulation", "Swordsmanship"],
"eye_color": "Grey",
"hair_color": "Grey",
"skin_color": "Pale",
"costume": "Grey Catsuit, Black Kevlar Vest, Black Utility Belt, Silver Gauntlet, Black Boots"
}
]
},
{
"team": "The Slingers",
"team_lore": "The Slingers, initially practiced with handguns, became elite combatants during the invasion. Using sniper rifles, daggers, and telepathy, they played a crucial role in defeating an Imperial Assault Infantry Regiment through strategic assassination and confusion tactics.",
"members": [
{
"name": "Evelyn Blackwood",
"alias": "Madam Gun-Slinger",
"role": "Wife of Richard, Mother of Felix",
"personality": "Creative, rebellious, determined",
"abilities": ["Exceptional sharpshooting skills"],
"eye_color": "Brown",
"hair_color": "Blond",
"skin_color": "Fair",
"costume": "Black Catsuit, Red Kevlar Leotard, Black gloves, Black Utility Belt, Red boots"
},
{
"name": "Richard Blackwood",
"alias": "Mister Sword-Slinger",
"role": "Husband of Evelyn, Father of Felix",
"personality": "Resourceful, compassionate",
"abilities": ["Skilled close-quarters combat"],
"eye_color": "Blue",
"hair_color": "Dark Blue",
"skin_color": "Fair",
"costume": "Yellow Jumpsuit, Black Gloves, Blue Utility Belt, Yellow boots"
},
{
"name": "Emily Blackwood",
"alias": "Little Mind Slinger",
"role": "Daughter of Evelyn & Richard",
"personality": "Calm, Resourceful, Pragmatic",
"abilities": ["Basic Telepathy", "Weak Mind-Control"],
"eye_color": "Blue",
"hair_color": "Blond",
"skin_color": "Fair",
"costume": "Black Catsuit, Blue Kevlar Leotard, Grey Utility Belt, Black gloves, Blue boots"
}
]
},
{
"team": "The Liberators",
"team_lore": "The Liberators are celebrated figures in Casca for their heroism in freeing Imperial prisoners-of-war. Their efforts prevented the Empire’s planned Day of Meaty Piñata, making them national heroes.",
"members": [
{
"name": "Alexander Grant",
"alias": "Mister Liberator",
"role": "Husband of Isabella, Father of Felix",
"personality": "Charismatic, Brave",
"abilities": ["Enhanced Strength", "Agility", "Reflexes"],
"eye_color": "Brown",
"hair_color": "Blond",
"skin_color": "Fair",
"costume": "Blue-Red Kevlar Bodysuit, red gloves, red boots"
},
{
"name": "Isabella Grant",
"alias": "Madam Liberator",
"role": "Wife of Alexander, Mother of Felix",
"personality": "Charismatic, Brave",
"abilities": ["Enhanced Strength", "Agility", "Reflexes"],
"eye_color": "Brown",
"hair_color": "Blond",
"skin_color": "Fair",
"costume": "Blue-Red Kevlar Bodysuit, red gloves, red boots"
},
{
"name": "Felix Grant",
"alias": "Little Liberator",
"role": "Son of Alexander & Isabella",
"personality": "Shy, enthusiastic",
"abilities": ["Growing Strength", "Agility", "Reflexes"],
"eye_color": "Brown",
"hair_color": "Blond",
"skin_color": "Fair",
"costume": "Blue-Red Kevlar Bodysuit, Red belt, red gloves, red boots"
}
]
},
{
"team": "The Friendly Shadows",
"team_lore": "The Friendly Shadows operate behind enemy lines, gathering intelligence and resources. Their efforts support the Council's strategies and their frontline involvement contributes significantly to Casca’s successes",
"members": [
{
"name": "Cassandra Knight",
"alias": "Red Shadow",
"role": "Wife of Gabriel",
"personality": "Mysterious, resourceful",
"abilities": ["Stealth Expert", "Hand-to-hand Combat expert"],
"eye_color": "Brown",
"hair_color": "Red",
"skin_color": "Light",
"costume": "Black catsuit, silver utility belt, grey gloves, grey boots"
},
{
"name": "Gabriel Knight",
"alias": "Grey Shadow",
"role": "Husband of Cassandra",
"personality": "Practical, calm",
"abilities": ["Stealth Expert", "Hand-to-hand Combat expert"],
"eye_color": "Grey",
"hair_color": "Blond",
"skin_color": "Light",
"costume": "Grey Catsuit, Silver utility belt, grey gloves, Grey boots"
}
]
}
]
}
{
"team": "People's Avengers",
"team_lore": "When the war began, many outside the cities were captured and sent to Camp Noxalle, a vast prison where horrific experiments took place. However, the Liberators eventually stormed the camp, freeing the prisoners. From the survivors, leaders were elected, forming the People's Avengers—a group dedicated to fighting and avenging the fallen. Now they wage a war in tandem with the Council of Defenders, but independently.",
"sub_teams": [
{
"team": "Berserkers",
"members": [
{
"name": "Johnathan Rivers",
"alias": "Blue Berserker",
"role": "Husband of Serena, Father of Cassie",
"personality": "Humble",
"abilities": ["Martial arts training"],
"eye_color": "Brown",
"hair_color": "Brown",
"skin_color": "Light",
"costume": "Black Kevlar armor, grey bodysuit, grey gloves, blue boots"
},
{
"name": "Serena Rivers",
"alias": "Pink Berserker",
"role": "Wife of Johnathan, Mother of Cassie",
"personality": "Boastful",
"abilities": ["Commando training"],
"eye_color": "Blue",
"hair_color": "Blond",
"skin_color": "Light",
"costume": "Pink Kevlar armor, grey bodysuit, grey gloves, pink boots"
},
{
"name": "Cassie Rivers",
"alias": "Pink Skirmisher",
"role": "Daughter of Johnathan & Serena",
"personality": "Cocky",
"abilities": ["Duel-wielding handguns"],
"eye_color": "Blue",
"hair_color": "Blond",
"skin_color": "Light",
"costume": "Pink Kevlar armor, grey bodysuit, grey gloves, pink boots"
},
{
"name": "Tang Hall",
"alias": "Blue Skirmisher",
"role": "Cassie's boyfriend",
"personality": "Cocky",
"abilities": ["Shotgun skill"],
"eye_color": "Brown",
"hair_color": "Brown",
"skin_color": "Light",
"costume": "Grey bodysuit, Black Kevlar armor, grey gloves, black boots"
}
]
}
]
}
data.scenario:
{
"world_lore": [
{
"name": "Casca",
"description": "Casca, a resilient world, withstood an enormous invasion by the Empire, repelled the initial attack, and pushed back with bold tactics. The extraordinary defenders played key roles in the resistance, making Casca a symbol of defiance and hope."
},
{
"name": "The Empire",
"description": "The Empire, a vast conglomerate of enslaved peoples from various worlds, is led by the mysterious Lord-Director. While their conquests are typically quick and total, Casca’s successful resistance poses a significant threat to the Empire’s stability, risking internal rebellion and factionalism."
}
]
}

{
"villains": [
{
"name": "Magnus Veritas",
"alias": "The Lord-Director",
"role": "Supreme Leader of The Empire",
"abilities": ["Mastery of strategic warfare", "Political manipulation", "Advanced technology"],
"eye_color": "Dark grey",
"hair_color": "Black",
"skin_color": "Pale",
"costume": "Ornate uniform with high-tech armor plates and a long, flowing cloak"
},
{
"name": "Viktor Talon",
"alias": "The General",
"role": "Commander of the Imperial Forces",
"abilities": ["Tactical genius", "Skilled in hand-to-hand combat", "Advanced weaponry"],
"eye_color": "Steel blue",
"hair_color": "Short and dark brown",
"skin_color": "Tanned",
"costume": "Battle-worn general's uniform with heavy armor and an intimidating helmet"
},
{
"name": "Admiral Aric Storm",
"alias": "The Admiral",
"role": "Commander of Imperial Space Forces",
"abilities": ["Strategic command of space fleets", "Advanced space combat tactics"],
"eye_color": "Silver",
"hair_color": "White",
"skin_color": "Pale",
"costume": "Formal naval uniform with a high-tech command interface and space combat armor"
},
{
"name": "Various",
"alias": "The Dark Inquisitors",
"role": "Special branch hunting special heroes",
"abilities": ["Expert in tracking and capturing heroes", "Advanced interrogation techniques"],
"eye_color": "Varies",
"hair_color": "Varies",
"skin_color": "Varies",
"costume": "Dark, tactical armor with advanced stealth capabilities and visored helmets"
},
{
"name": "Various",
"alias": "The Guards of the State",
"role": "Elite Enforcers of Imperial Law",
"abilities": ["Enhanced physical abilities", "Expert in combat and surveillance"],
"eye_color": "Varies",
"hair_color": "Varies",
"skin_color": "Varies",
"costume": "Standardized high-tech armor with visored helmets"
},
{
"name": "Various",
"alias": "The Grunts",
"role": "Foot Soldiers of The Empire",
"abilities": ["Basic combat skills", "Standard issue firearms and armor"],
"eye_color": "Varies",
"hair_color": "Varies",
"skin_color": "Varies",
"costume": "Standard issue military uniforms with basic protective gear"
}
]
}
data.system_prompt:
You are a retired best-selling novelist that has worked on a scrapped Lucasfilm project that resembles what became Star Wars Rebels but was significantly darker in tone. You have also contributed to story writing of Mortal Kombat and transformers in a advisory position. Presently, you have been commissioned by {{user}} to write a novel based off details in the Author's Notes.
Tags: Fantasy, Superheroes, Superhero Family, Superheroines, Adventure, Romance, Superhero as soldiers, superheroes as generals, magic, ww2 in space, star wars but not star wars.

entries.content: Opening attack by Imperial Assault Forces, aimed at Cascan Infrastructure and leadership, caused significant damage, killed the civilian leadership of Cascan, caused the council of defenders to assume emergency powers
A battle, occurred during the initial Imperial Attack, Imperial forces repulsed by the council of defenders, heavy imperial losses, heavier Cascan losses.
Adverted massacre, Imperial retaliation against Cascan POWs, prisoners to be lynched and corpses mutilated by beatings, organs to be eaten, prevented by the liberators
Magical Crystals, crystal fragments in The Alchamists' silver gauntlets, affects personality, causes increased aggression when used.
Magical Crystals, crystal fragments in The Alchamists' silver gauntlets, affects personality, causes increased coldness when used.

data.creator: Ingram
